casebody.data:
TD BANK, NA, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
UNIVERSITY IMAGING CENTER, LLC ; Najam Kazmi and Surayya Kazmi, Defendants-Petitioners,
and
Century Savings Bank; Colonial Bank FSB; United States of America; Bank of America, NA; Siemens Financial Services, Inc.; Enterprise Zone Development Corp. of Vineland and Millville ; Susquehanna Bank; Coastal Leasing, Inc.; State of New Jersey; Harbor Pavilion Condominium Association; Cumberland Professional Campus Condominium Association t/a Cumberland Professional Campus, Defendants. C-489 September Term 2017
080153 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 12, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003980-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
